page.title: 18CHANGES AND LOCAL ISSUES
page.content: Two changes external to the area are having a big impact. The{M.25}is providing quicker{access}to many parts of the country, for this area was previously{badly served by motorway. } The choice of{Stansted}as London's Third Airport will give an {international airport}within{20 } {minutes}journey but may increase{noise pollution 16-fold. However, both the M.25 and Stansted are expected to {raise house prices}here. We asked a sample of Shoppers and Shopkeepers the following question: Are you in favour of Sunday opening of shops in this area? 80% of those asked were found to be against Sunday opening.
